Lesson 1: Why Program Evaluation is Important

Reflection

Instructions: In the text boxes below, take a moment to reflect on the following questions and select the Submit button.

Program evaluation is a way to carefully collect information about a program or an aspect of it in order to make decisions about it. There are countless different ways to evaluate a program and we will learn about some of them in this course.
